DOC.brief_title: Automated Fetal Femur Length Measurement Five-Dimensional Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: This Prospective pilot study perform Fetal Care Unit Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Ninety pregnant woman recruit Fetal Care Unit fulfill inclusion criterion . They counsel include study . All case subject : 1 . Full history take include patient 's age , parity , last menstrual period , estimate gestational age date , past history medical disorder , clinical examination ( General abdominal ) . 2 . Two-Dimensional Ultrasound Five-Dimensional Ultrasound do case assessment fetal femur length . The FL Two-Dimensional Ultrasound ( Gold standard ) make center ' U ' shape end bone . The FL Five-Dimensional Ultrasound measure Pressing Five-Dimensional Ultrasound long bone Button extract Fetal Long Bones automatically . The estimation gestational age femur length Two-Dimensional Ultrasound Five-Dimensional Ultrasound compare gestational age calculate accurate date last menstrual period .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Singleton pregnancy . 2 . At third trim pregnancy . 3 . The patient must sure last normal menstrual period , last three regular cycle hormonal contraception pregnancy . 1 . Multiple pregnancy . 2 . Fetal anomaly . 3 . Amniotic fluid index < 5 cm . 4 . Medical disorder diabetes mellitus , hypertension . 5 . Obese patient . BMI > 30 6 . Intrauterine growth retardation . 7 . Post term pregnancy > 41 week .
